pr_title: Used fixed session time/offset for time tests

timeline.message:
Used fixed session time for time test

AT TIME ZONE for TIME is performed by converting the TIME value
to TIME WITH TIME ZONE using the session time zone before applying
AT TIME ZONE.  When the session time zone is a political time zone,
the offset is determined based on the rules at the session start time.

This change fixes the session start time to a known value to make
the conversion from political timezone to offset deterministic.

Use fixed offset for test

The conversion from TIMESTAMP to TIME WITH TIME ZONE relies on the
session time zone. When the session time zone is a political time zone,
the offset is determined based on the rules at the session start time.

This change uses a fixed offset to avoid an offset shift due to DST
rules, which changes the values and affects the result of approx_distinct.

Use fixed offset for test

The conversion from TIMESTAMP to TIME WITH TIME ZONE relies on the
session time zone. When the session time zone is a political time zone,
the offset is determined based on the rules at the session start time.

This change uses a fixed offset to avoid an offset shift due to DST
rules, which changes the values and affects the result of approx_distinct.
